text: Mister Cory is a 1957 American crime drama movie directed by Blake Edwards and starring Tony Curtis, Martha Hyer, Charles Bickford, Kathryn Grant, William Reynolds, Henry Daniell. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1957 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Blake Edwards Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Mister Cory
